name: ai-chatkit (pasonk)
description: [项目级] A full-stack ai agent chat project, built with langgraph+fastapi+nextjs, supporting tool invocation and RAG knowledge base。来源: https://github.com/pasonk/ai-chatkit

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
A full-stack ai agent chat project, built with langgraph+fastapi+nextjs, supporting tool invocation and RAG knowledge base

来源: https://github.com/pasonk/ai-chatkit
语言: Python
Stars: 75

genes.title: 项目结构
genes.content:
README.md
README_zh.md
backend
backend/.env.example
backend/.gitignore
backend/.python-version
backend/app
backend/pyproject.toml
backend/resource
backend/tests
backend/uv.lock
frontend
frontend/.env.local
frontend/app
frontend/next-env.d.ts
frontend/package.json
frontend/pnpm-lock.yaml
frontend/postcss.config.mjs
frontend/tailwind.config.ts
frontend/tsconfig.json

genes.title: 核心特性
genes.content:
1. AI agent chat application built on the langGraph framework, supporting custom behavior logic orchestration for agents.
2. Supports custom knowledge base Q&A capabilities for agents, using ChromaDB for knowledge base storage and querying.
3. Supports custom tool invocation for agents.
4. Python backend interface API, implemented based on FastAPI, Support full asynchronous calls.
5. Supports custom frontend applications for agents, implemented using NextJS.
6. Supports chat streaming output, with frontend support for SSE (Server-Sent Events) streaming.
7. Supports multiple custom agents
8. Su
